title: How to Dress Up As Mario from Super Mario Bros

steps.headline: Dress in blue overalls and a red long sleeve t-shirt.
steps.description: These don't have to be in great shape, and if you don't have overalls, just wear a red shirt and blue pants/jeans.

steps.headline: Add a red cap.
steps.description: It is helpful if you can draw or stick on a white circle and a red capital "M" in it.

steps.headline: Stick on a fake mustache.
steps.description: Use a ready-made mustache, or make one from fake fur/fluff. Another alternative is to draw one on if needed.

steps.headline: Imitate Mario's physique.
steps.description: Perhaps add some padding around the tummy for a more round appearance.

steps.headline: Wear comfortable brown colored shoes.
steps.description: Mario isn't going to be running around in expensive shoes!

steps.headline: Practice your Italian accent.
steps.description: Everyone loves a good Mario impression.

tyn: Red cap with "M" marked on it
text: Dress in blue overalls and a red long sleeve t-shirt. These don't have to be in great shape, and if you don't have overalls, just wear a red shirt and blue pants/jeans. Add a red cap. It is helpful if you can draw or stick on a white circle and a red capital "M" in it. Stick on a fake mustache. Use a ready-made mustache, or make one from fake fur/fluff. Another alternative is to draw one on if needed. Imitate Mario's physique. Perhaps add some padding around the tummy for a more round appearance. Add white gloves. These are trademark Mario. Wear comfortable brown colored shoes. Mario isn't going to be running around in expensive shoes! Practice your Italian accent. Everyone loves a good Mario impression.
sentences: Dress in blue overalls and a red long sleeve t-shirt.
These don't have to be in great shape, and if you don't have overalls, just wear a red shirt and blue pants/jeans.
It is helpful if you can draw or stick on a white circle and a red capital "M" in it.
Use a ready-made mustache, or make one from fake fur/fluff.
Another alternative is to draw one on if needed.
Perhaps add some padding around the tummy for a more round appearance.
Mario isn't going to be running around in expensive shoes!
Everyone loves a good Mario impression.
